title: Lady Gaga’s “The Mayhem Ball”: How to Get Tickets
description: Lady Gaga returns in summer 2025 with "The Mayhem Ball." Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here. Lady Gaga’s “The Mayhem Ball”: How to Get Tickets Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: Lady Gaga has announced "The Mayhem Ball," an arena tour taking place in summer and fall 2025. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets and everything else you need to know.
text: After headlining Coachella and a series of special shows in Mexico City, Rio de Janeiro, and Singapore, Lady Gaga will embark on a 2025 tour. Titled the “Mayhem Ball,” the arena outing will see the Mother Monster returning to arenas in North America and Europe throughout the summer and fall. Get Lady Gaga Tickets Here Get tickets here, and read on for more details on about Lady Gaga’s “The Mayhem Ball,” including details on pre-sale tickets and more. Lady Gaga’s 2025 “The Mayhem Ball” will hit arenas throughout the US, with a dip into Canada and a number of shows in Europe and the UK. The focus of the tour will be music from her recently released seventh album, Mayhem. “I wasn’t planning to tour this year after my shows in Singapore but the incredible response to the new album inspired me to keep things going,” the artist shared via social media. “We chose arenas this time to give me the opportunity to control the details of the show in a way you simply can’t in stadiums — and honestly, I can’t wait. This show is designed to be the kind of theatrical and electrifying experience that brings Mayhem to life exactly how I envision it.” The trek kicks off with two nights in Las Vegas. Then, Gaga will make her way to Seattle, New York, Miami, Toronto, and Chicago, with multiple shows in each city. September takes her across the pond to multiple shows throughout the UK, followed by two more months of shows throughout Europe. The current layout sees her wrapping the tour in November with three nights in Paris. How Can I Get Lady Gaga’s “Mayhem Ball” Tickets? Those interested in attending the “Mayhem Ball” should start by signing up for a pre-sale through Lady Gaga’s Ticketmaster profile, which prompts users to select a specific show to target. This will unlock access to an artist pre-sale scheduled for Wednesday, April 2nd at 12:00 p.m. local time. Additional pre-sales for Citi Cardmembers and Verizon Access subscribers will take place on March 31st and April 1st, respectively,  also on Ticketmaster. Tickets are set to go on sale to the general public on Thursday, April 3rd at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via Get tickets here, where orders are 110% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. There are a number of VIP packages for the “Mayhem Ball,” with Premium VIP, VIP, Gold, Silver, and Early Entry options available. The most inclusive, Premium, includes a ticket within the first three rows, access to a pre-show hospitality lounge, drink tokens, a merch item, and an Uber voucher to get to and from the show. All of the packages include a dedicated check-in area, a collectible laminate, and a concierge team, with various add-ons available across the different tiers. For the five VIP packages, it’s noted than none of the options include artist access or time with Gaga herself. Monsters planning a trip to attend “The Mayhem Ball” can save 15% off travel and accommodations through Booking.com. Who Is Opening for Lady Gaga’s 2025 Tour? No openers have been announced yet for the “Mayhem Ball,” which is not unusual for the artist. Gaga’s 2022 “Chromatica Ball” also did not feature any supporting artists. What Are Lady Gaga’s 2025 Tour Dates? See the full list of dates below, and secure tickets here. After headlining Coachella and a series of special shows in Mexico City, Rio de Janeiro, and Singapore, Lady Gaga will embark on a 2025 tour. Titled the “Mayhem Ball,” the arena outing will see the Mother Monster returning to arenas in North America and Europe throughout the summer and fall.

Lady Gaga’s 2025 “The Mayhem Ball” will hit arenas throughout the US, with a dip into Canada and a number of shows in Europe and the UK. The focus of the tour will be music from her recently released seventh album, Mayhem.

“I wasn’t planning to tour this year after my shows in Singapore but the incredible response to the new album inspired me to keep things going,” the artist shared via social media. “We chose arenas this time to give me the opportunity to control the details of the show in a way you simply can’t in stadiums — and honestly, I can’t wait. This show is designed to be the kind of theatrical and electrifying experience that brings Mayhem to life exactly how I envision it.”

The trek kicks off with two nights in Las Vegas. Then, Gaga will make her way to Seattle, New York, Miami, Toronto, and Chicago, with multiple shows in each city. September takes her across the pond to multiple shows throughout the UK, followed by two more months of shows throughout Europe. The current layout sees her wrapping the tour in November with three nights in Paris.

How Can I Get Lady Gaga’s “Mayhem Ball” Tickets?

Those interested in attending the “Mayhem Ball” should start by signing up for a pre-sale through Lady Gaga’s Ticketmaster profile, which prompts users to select a specific show to target. This will unlock access to an artist pre-sale scheduled for Wednesday, April 2nd at 12:00 p.m. local time. Additional pre-sales for Citi Cardmembers and Verizon Access subscribers will take place on March 31st and April 1st, respectively,  also on Ticketmaster.

Tickets are set to go on sale to the general public on Thursday, April 3rd at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via Get tickets here, where orders are 110% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

There are a number of VIP packages for the “Mayhem Ball,” with Premium VIP, VIP, Gold, Silver, and Early Entry options available. The most inclusive, Premium, includes a ticket within the first three rows, access to a pre-show hospitality lounge, drink tokens, a merch item, and an Uber voucher to get to and from the show. All of the packages include a dedicated check-in area, a collectible laminate, and a concierge team, with various add-ons available across the different tiers. For the five VIP packages, it’s noted than none of the options include artist access or time with Gaga herself.

Monsters planning a trip to attend “The Mayhem Ball” can save 15% off travel and accommodations through Booking.com.

Who Is Opening for Lady Gaga’s 2025 Tour?

No openers have been announced yet for the “Mayhem Ball,” which is not unusual for the artist. Gaga’s 2022 “Chromatica Ball” also did not feature any supporting artists.
